description:
Bunchu blocks Taikoubou, Kou Hiko, the princes, and the rest of the gang from proceeding any further. Kou Hiko and Bunchu then fight one another.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kou Hiko and Bunchu Battle on the High Road
Kou Hiko, Bunchuu, Kaidou ni Taiketsu Su
Le général Fun Faze contre Wenzon
黄飛虎, 聞仲, 街道に対決す
